title: Council Regulation (EC) No 24/97 of 20 December 1996 repealing Regulation (EEC) No 1729/76 concerning the communication of information on the state of the Community's energy supplies
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 24/97 of 20 December 1996 repealing Regulation (EEC) No 1729/76 concerning the communication of information on the state of the Community's energy supplies
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 1729/76 is hereby repealed.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1996.
For the Council
The President
S. BARRETT
(1) OJ No L 198, 23. 7. 1976, p. 1.
(2) OJ No C 153, 9. 7. 1975, pp. 2 and 5.
(3) OJ No C 153, 9. 7. 1975, p. 6.
